title: No fullscreen option on VNC
author: bpsib
body_snippet: There's no fullscreen option when using VNC. Using the fullscreen (F11) option does NOT make it fullscreen. The toolbars are still there and can't do keyboard shortcuts such as alt+tab on remote computer. This makes it completely useless for me.

iterations.description: VNC protocol has no dedicated fullscreen mode; the generic F11 FullscreenHandler exists but VncSharpCore.RemoteDesktop supports a native fullscreen/scale mode that is not wired up for VNC connections.

notes:
AI triage (claude): VNC protocol has no dedicated fullscreen mode; the generic F11 FullscreenHandler exists but VncSharpCore.RemoteDesktop supports a native fullscreen/scale mode that is not wired up for VNC connections.
Approach: Wire VncSharpCore RemoteDesktop's scaling/fullscreen capability into the existing FullscreenHandler toggle (F11), ensuring the VNC control stretches to fill the panel when fullscreen is activated, mirroring the RDP SmartSize pattern.
